section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:There is never a prophet who has not warned the Ummah of that one-eyed liar; behold he is one-eyed and your Lord is not one-eyed. On his forehead are the letters k f. r. (Kafir)
